articles.description: England - as a team, and as individuals - have lots of questions to answer when they face India in the final Test of the series, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Why England have so much to prove in foothills of Himalayas

articles.description: Real Madrid midfielder Jude Bellingham is banned for two La Liga matches for his red card after the controversial draw at Valencia.
articles.title: Real midfielder Bellingham banned for two games

articles.description: Masters champion Jon Rahm says Official World Golf Ranking is not "a good system" after LIV Golf withdraws its application to join.
articles.title: LIV Golf: League withdraws world ranking bid as Jon Rahm criticises system

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she is "not too concerned" about tournament results, as the priority this year is to develop her game.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: Briton 'not too concerned' about tournament results

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Rodri's unbeaten run now stands at an incredible 59 games. BBC Sport discusses why he is so important to the team.
articles.title: 'Best midfielder in the world' - Man City's invincible Rodri

articles.description: Spanish prosecutors call for Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti to be jailed for four years and nine months for avoiding 1m euros (£854,000) in tax.
articles.title: Prosecutors demand near five-year Ancelotti sentence

articles.description: George Russell and Max Verstappen are leading calls from drivers for Formula 1 cars to be raised for the sake of their health and safety.
articles.title: Max Verstappen and George Russell want F1 cars raised

articles.description: Scarlets centre Joe Roberts replaces George North to make his Six Nations debut alongside Owen Watkin on Sunday.
articles.title: Wales change centre pairing against France

articles.description: Mark Wood replaces fellow seamer Ollie Robinson in England's only change for the final Test against India in Dharamsala starting on Thursday.
articles.title: Wood replaces Robinson for fifth Test

articles.description: Paris St-Germain forward Kylian Mbappe says he has "no problems" with manager Luis Enrique after his two goals against Real Sociedad send PSG into the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Mbappe has 'no problems' with manager Enrique
